rows.descEn: The most basic way to buy and sell crypto at current market prices. No leverage risk, ideal for beginners.
Trade long or short on crypto prices via perpetual or delivery contracts with high leverage. High risk, high reward.
Borrow funds to amplify trading size in spot markets. Lower leverage than futures, relatively manageable risk.
Traditional finance-like products offered by exchanges, including crypto stocks, ETF tracking, and index products.
Earn interest on idle assets through flexible savings, fixed deposits, liquidity mining, and staking.

rows.descEn: Built-in decentralized wallet for accessing DeFi protocols, NFT markets, and cross-chain bridges without leaving the exchange.
Buy or sell the right to trade assets at a specific price and time. Maximum loss is the premium paid, with flexible strategies.
Copy professional traders strategies with one click. No market analysis needed, ideal for time-poor or inexperienced investors.
Built-in social platform for sharing views, following KOLs, joining discussions, and getting market insights.
Automated trading strategy tools including grid bots, DCA bots, and arbitrage bots running 24/7.
Over-the-counter bulk trading for large orders ($10,000+) without market impact, with dedicated quotes and settlement.
Participate in new token launches. Usually requires holding platform tokens or completing tasks for early-stage token access at low prices.
Exchange-built ecosystem including platform tokens (BNB/OKB/BGB), public chains, NFT markets, and incubators.
